results.title: ESLint Configuration Inconsistencies
results.summary: Centralized ESLint configuration by creating a root .eslintrc.json file and removing all subdirectory .eslintrc.json files to ensure consistent linting rules across the monorepo.

results.title: Code Smells in API Endpoints
results.summary: Refactored API routes to use a service layer, improving adherence to the Single Responsibility Principle. Created service classes for vehicles, users, maintenance, and work orders, along with corresponding repository classes. Updated route handlers to use these services and implemented error handling with custom NotFoundError. All code follows TypeScript strict mode and uses parameterized queries for database operations.

results.title: Overuse of Shared Packages
results.summary: Restructured the shared package by splitting utilities into domain-specific folders, improving modularity and reducing tight coupling. Created new files with production-ready TypeScript code, including error handling, logging, and security best practices.

results.title: Cyclic Dependencies in Module Graph
results.summary: Refactored cyclic dependencies in the module graph by introducing interfaces and dependency injection. Created interfaces for VehicleService and MaintenanceService, updated service implementations to use these interfaces, and set up dependency injection using InversifyJS. Added comprehensive error handling, logging, and unit tests to ensure functionality and robustness.

results.title: Data Validation Missing in Workers
results.summary: Implemented Zod schema validation for telemetry, maintenance, and notification workers. Updated processing functions to validate input data before database insertion. Added comprehensive error handling and logging. Created unit tests for telemetry processing to ensure validation and error handling work as expected.

results.title: iOS App Crash on Low Memory
results.summary: Updated VehicleListViewController to implement proper memory management, including the use of NSCache for image caching, handling memory warnings, and proper deinitialization to prevent memory leaks.

results.title: Android Performance Issues
results.error: Unexpected token 'T', "To address"... is not valid JSON

results.title: CI/CD Environment Isolation
results.summary: Created separate CI/CD workflows for staging and production environments to ensure proper isolation. The staging workflow deploys on pushes to 'develop' and 'staging' branches and pull requests to 'develop'. The production workflow deploys on pushes to 'main' and on release publication, implementing a blue-green deployment strategy. Both workflows include environment-specific Azure credentials and run appropriate tests post-deployment.

results.title: Magic Numbers

results.title: Inconsistent File Naming
